summary.en:
TYPE OF CAREGP Shared CarePublic Hospital ClinicMidwifery Group Practice /CaseloadPrivate MidwifePrivate Obstetrician
COSTHospital = free GP = fee for serviceFreeFree$3500-6000 out of pocket average (some Medicare rebates)$4000+ average out of pocket (some Medicare/private health rebates)
LOCATIONGP and HospitalHospital outpatients or antenatal clinicBirth centre or private clinic on/off hospitalHome, birth centre or private clinicPrivate clinic
PREGNANCY EDUCATIONHospital-based classes available for feeHospital-based classes available for feeContinuous, one- on-one + hospital-based classes available for feeContinuous, one- on-one + hospital-based classes available for feeMinimal education depending on OB + hospital-based classes available for fee
SUPPORT AT TIME OF BIRTHMidwife (doctors available in case of complication)Midwife (doctors available in case of complication)Midwife (doctors available in case of complication)Midwife (if homebirth, transfer to hospital occurs in case of complication)Midwife until end of pushing stage, OB usually visits during labour 1-2 times depending on length
LOCATION OF BIRTHPublic hospitalPublic hospitalPublic hospital/ birth centre affiliated with sameHome, public hospital or birth centre affiliated with samePrivate hospital (unless major complication then possible transfer to public system)

التكلفةالمشفى الحكومي مجاناًالطبيب العام بحسب المعالجة المقدمةمجاناًمجاناً$3500-6000 على حساب المريض مع خصومات لمن يحمل بطاقة ميديكير$4000+ حساب المريض مع خصومات لمن يحمل بطاقة ميديكير
المكانالمشفى أو لدى الطبيب العامالمشفى عيادات خارجية للمرضى غير المقيمينمركز للتوليد المشفىالبيت مركز توليد عيادة خاصةعيادة خاصة

SUPPORT AT TIME OF BIRTHMidwife (doctors available in case of complication)Midwife (doctors available in case of complication)Midwife (doctors available in case of complication)Midwife (if homebirth, transfer to hospital occurs in case of complication)Midwife until end of pushing stage, OB usually visits during labour 1-2 times depending on length
